Kyle Vogt

Kyle Vogt

Founder, Justin.tv

During November of 2006, Kyle joined up Justin Kan, Emmett Shear, and Michael Seibel to start a company called Justin.tv. The concept was pretty simple – build a website that features a live video feed of Justin’s life. They did it, and it was wildly successful. Over 2.5 million people tuned in to watch Justin’s during our first month of operation. They are currently turning Justin.tv into a platform so that anyone can have their own Justin.tv.
